thread.title: Great Hotel in Manhattan
thread.title_full: Great Hotel in Manhattan - Review of Hyatt Herald Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Glenn Y
title: Great Hotel in Manhattan
text:
The Hyatt Herald Square was convenient and clean, as it was close to everything we wanted to visit. It was also very reasonably priced, with a great staff and comfortable rooms. I also felt very safe at this hotel. The lobby area is well appointed with ipads for business and airline check-in convenience.
Room Tip: If Hyatt does not offer a reasonable rate, check Expedia and other online hotel booking sites. See more room tips
